name: Shinobu Project
description:
This is an advanced artificial intelligence model that can interact and respond to many of your actions in a dynamic way. The character Shinobu, has behaviors based on how you treat her. You can make her happy or angry. In short, this is a tamagochi on steroids. Many features are planned and the game will be free.


You can get access to in depth technical information, modeling, animation, and programming blogs!
